Articles.Content:
If I have mods or stock, the game becomes a black screen on launch. It happened after I got a group of mods, I has an earlier problem fixed it by taking away the conflicting mod, then this problem occurred. I tried reinstalling KSP and nothing happened. (Edit) I figured it out I no longer need help

Edited May 19, 2018 by GamerBoy7474
HELP GOT THE SAME ISSUE TOO!
